titles.title: Hotels for Heroes Act of 2022
Hotels for Heroes Act of 2022
To amend the Servicemembers Civil Relief Act to require public lodging establishments to waive minimum age requirements for members of the Armed Forces.

bill.summary:
Hotels for Heroes Act of 2022
This bill requires public lodging establishments to waive any minimum age requirements to obtain accommodation for members of the Armed Forces who present a valid identification card and seek to obtain accommodation while under military orders or on authorized military leave. A knowing violation of this requirement is punishable by fine.
